title: Foreign population of Belgium in 2019 , by origin
summary: France was ranked first in the number of Foreign population among Belgium Country in .
While this is mainly due to the population size , it also reflects the growing popularity and widespread population of social media in France .
Hence , it is not surprising that , as of , the penetration rate of the other major social media platforms in France was on a high level too .
gold: Belgium has a multicultural landscape ; a variety of nationalities coexist in the country . Brussels houses most of the European Union institutions . This is the reason behind the nickname `` capital of Europe `` .
